findings.title: SQL Injection: app.py:42
findings.description: User input from 'username' parameter is directly concatenated into SQL query without sanitization
findings.recommendation: Use parameterized queries with sqlalchemy's text() function or ORM query methods
findings.exploit_scenario: Attacker can craft input like `admin' OR '1'='1` to bypass authentication

findings.title: XSS: templates/user_profile.html:15
findings.description: User-provided bio text is rendered without escaping
findings.recommendation: Use Flask's escape() function or enable auto-escaping in Jinja2
findings.exploit_scenario: Attacker can inject <script>alert(document.cookie)</script> to steal session tokens

findings.title: Missing Error Handling
findings.description: Database operations are not wrapped in try-except blocks
findings.recommendation: Add proper error handling with specific exception types

findings.title: Hardcoded Secret: config.py:8
findings.description: API key is hardcoded in source code
findings.recommendation: Move secrets to environment variables or AWS Secrets Manager

findings.title: Missing Alt Text
findings.description: Profile image missing alt attribute (WCAG 2.1 Level A violation)
findings.recommendation: Add alt='User profile photo' to img tag

findings.title: Magic Number
findings.description: Magic number 3600 should be a named constant

findings.title: Inconsistent Button Styling
findings.description: Primary button uses different padding than design system
findings.recommendation: Update to match design tokens: padding: 12px 24px
